title: Article Schema
description: A JSON Schema for the Article credential that represents articles using schema.org vocabulary.

id.description: The unique identifier for the article, typically a URI.

schema:name.description: The name or title of the article.

schema:url.description: The URL where the article can be accessed.

oneOf.description: The URI of the author of the article.

id.description: The URI of the author.

schema:name.description: The name of the author.

oneOf.description: The URI of the creator of the article.

id.description: The URI of the creator.

schema:name.description: The name of the creator.

schema:dateCreated.description: The date and time when the article was created.

schema:datePublished.description: The date and time when the article was published.

schema:dateModified.description: The date and time when the article was last modified.

schema:keywords.description: Keywords or tags associated with the article.

schema:license.description: The license under which the article is distributed.

oneOf.description: The URI of the copyright holder.

id.description: The URI of the copyright holder.

schema:name.description: The name of the copyright holder.

schema:copyrightHolder.description: The copyright holder of the article.

schema:inLanguage.description: The language of the article (ISO 639-1 code).

schema:isAccessibleForFree.description: Whether the article is accessible for free.

schema:thumbnailUrl.description: The URL of a thumbnail image for the article.

schema:image.description: The URL of an image representing the article.

schema:isPartOf.description: The URI of a larger creative work of which this article is a part.

schema:hasPart.description: Array of URIs of creative works that are parts of this article.

schema:citation.description: Citations or references used in the article.

schema:abstract.description: An abstract or summary of the article.

schema:wordCount.description: The number of words in the article.

schema:characterCount.description: The number of characters in the article.

schema:pageCount.description: The number of pages in the article.

schema:duration.description: The duration of the article (for time-based media).

schema:interactionType.description: The type of interaction being measured.

schema:interactionStatistic.description: Statistics about user interactions with the article.

oneOf.description: The URI of the subject matter.

id.description: The URI of the subject matter.

schema:name.description: The name of the subject matter.

schema:about.description: The subject matter of the article.

schema:accessMode.description: The human sensory perceptual system or cognitive faculty through which a person may process or perceive information.

schema:accessModeSufficient.description: A list of single or combined accessModes that are sufficient to understand all the intellectual content of a resource.

schema:accessibilityAPI.description: Indicates that the resource is compatible with the referenced accessibility API.

schema:accessibilityControl.description: Identifies input methods that are sufficient to fully control the described resource.

schema:accessibilityFeature.description: Content features of the resource, such as accessible media, alternatives and supported enhancements for accessibility.

schema:accessibilityHazard.description: A characteristic of the described resource that is physiologically dangerous to some users.

schema:accessibilitySummary.description: A human-readable summary of specific accessibility features or deficiencies.

oneOf.description: The URI of the accountable person.

id.description: The URI of the accountable person.

schema:name.description: The name of the accountable person.

schema:accountablePerson.description: Specifies the Person that is legally accountable for the Article.

oneOf.description: The URI of the aggregate rating.

schema:aggregateRating.description: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.

schema:alternativeHeadline.description: A secondary title of the Article.

schema:commentCount.description: The number of comments this Article has received.

oneOf.description: The URI of the content location.

id.description: The URI of the content location.

schema:name.description: The name of the content location.

schema:contentLocation.description: The location depicted or described in the content.

oneOf.description: The content rating as text.

schema:contentRating.description: Official rating of a piece of content.

oneOf.description: The URI of the contributor.

id.description: The URI of the contributor.

schema:name.description: The name of the contributor.

schema:contributor.description: A secondary contributor to the Article.

schema:copyrightNotice.description: Text of a notice appropriate for describing the copyright aspects of this Article.

oneOf.description: The URI of the country of origin.

id.description: The URI of the country of origin.

schema:name.description: The name of the country of origin.

schema:countryOfOrigin.description: The country of origin of something, including products as well as creative works.

schema:creativeWorkStatus.description: The status of a creative work in terms of its stage in a lifecycle.

oneOf.description: The URI of the editor.

id.description: The URI of the editor.

schema:name.description: The name of the editor.

schema:editor.description: Specifies the Person who edited the Article.

schema:expires.description: Date the content expires and is no longer useful or available.

schema:isFamilyFriendly.description: Indicates whether this content is family friendly.

oneOf.description: The URI of the location where the work was created.

id.description: The URI of the location where the work was created.

schema:name.description: The name of the location where the work was created.

schema:locationCreated.description: The location where the Article was created.

oneOf.description: The URI of the main entity.

id.description: The URI of the main entity.

schema:name.description: The name of the main entity.

schema:mainEntity.description: Indicates the primary entity described in some page or other CreativeWork.

oneOf.description: The URI of the producer.

id.description: The URI of the producer.

schema:name.description: The name of the producer.

schema:producer.description: The person or organization who produced the work.

oneOf.description: The URI of the publisher.

id.description: The URI of the publisher.

schema:name.description: The name of the publisher.

oneOf.description: The URI of the review.

id.description: The URI of the review.

schema:name.description: The name of the review.

schema:text.description: The textual content of this Article.

schema:timeRequired.description: Approximate or typical time it usually takes to work with or through the content of this work.

schema:typicalAgeRange.description: The typical expected age range, e.g. '7-9', '11-'.

oneOf.description: The version number.
The version as text.
The identifier as text.
The identifier as URI.

schema:name.description: The name of the identifier.

schema:identifier.description: The identifier property represents any kind of identifier for any kind of Thing.

oneOf.description: The URI of the main entity of page.

id.description: The URI of the main entity of page.

schema:name.description: The name of the main entity of page.

schema:mainEntityOfPage.description: Indicates a page (or other CreativeWork) for which this thing is the main entity being described.

schema:sameAs.description: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's identity.

oneOf.description: The URI of the subject.

id.description: The URI of the subject.

schema:name.description: The name of the subject.

schema:subjectOf.description: A CreativeWork or Event about this Thing.

schema:articleBody.description: The actual body of the article.

schema:articleSection.description: Articles may belong to one or more 'sections' in a magazine or newspaper, such as Sports, Lifestyle, etc.

oneOf.description: The backstory as text.

id.description: The URI of the backstory.

schema:name.description: The name of the backstory.

schema:backstory.description: For an Article, typically a NewsArticle, the backstory property provides a textual summary giving a brief explanation of why and how an article was created.

oneOf.description: The page number on which the work ends.
The page on which the work ends, e.g. 'xvi'.

schema:pageEnd.description: The page on which the work ends; for example '138' or 'xvi'.

oneOf.description: The page number on which the work starts.
The page on which the work starts, e.g. 'xiii'.

schema:pageStart.description: The page on which the work starts; for example '135' or 'xiii'.

schema:pagination.description: Any description of pages that is not separated into pageStart and pageEnd.

oneOf.description: The URI of the shared content.

id.description: The URI of the shared content.

schema:name.description: The name of the shared content.

schema:sharedContent.description: A CreativeWork such as an image, video, or audio clip shared as part of this posting.

oneOf.description: The URI of the speakable specification.

id.description: The URI of the speakable specification.

schema:name.description: The name of the speakable specification.

schema:speakable.description: Indicates sections of a Web page that are particularly 'speakable' in the sense of being highlighted as being especially appropriate for text-to-speech conversion.
